TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_János_Áder, title = János_Áder, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/János_Áder} }

S.FORM: = János Áder = Mntucing hngkawas 1959 idas 5 jiyax 3 ka János Áder ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Hungary ta sayang o kiya ka János Áder, pnaah hngkawas 2012 idas 5 jiyax 10 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. = Áder János = Áder János (Kari Hungary: Áder János, kngkawas 1959 idas 5 diyax 9-), Hungary ryusu, seyji jnwu. Kngkawas 1990 prading psdhuwan phiyu Cingmin Mong Gikay giying, kngkawas 1998 dhuq kngkawas 2002 ngalan Hungary Kokomin Gikay cusi, kngkawas 2009 wada mangal Oco Gikay giying. Kngkawas 2012 idas 5 diyax 2 wada danan umau soto Hungary Hungary Kwohuy, kngkawas 2017 ka wada mangal soto Dungan. Kndusan Mntuting tuiwil daya Hungary tiping alang mkbrnux Cornau. Kngkawas 1978 mtmay sotu Budapest Pyasan Tubeyhing Roland Hwasweyying smluhay horicu. Kngkawas 1986 dhuq kngkawas 1990, hiya u Hungary Ksweyweyn Syakayswey Keyngkyo Pumn na weynsu. Hiya ka Cingmin Mong pnrdingan pnhiyu na uri, hiya ka Tang dha hwaswey cwancya. Kngkawas 1990 dhuq kngkawas 2009 cida u kwohuy giying ka hiya. Kngkawas 1998 idas 6 dhuq kngkawas 2002 idas 5 hiya u ngalan kwohuy cusi. Kngkawas 2009 cida u wada phyuwan O Co gikay giying ka hiya. Kngkawas 2011 cida u wada tumal knpriyux Hungary pnwaya shwa na qpahun phiyu waya, so musa kndukuricu sing ka shwa Hungary. Hiya u tumal snburah smmalu waya seyngkyo na qpahun phiyu waya uri. Soto Kngkawas 2012 idas 4 diyax 16 cida, wada psdhuwan soto hosweynjn cucng cida ka Cingmin Mong, kiya ka muda rmilih runbung muru bntasan sediq mi mi wada malax qpahun ka brah soto Schmitt Pal. Kwohuy meytaq hyo cida hiya ka ngalan ccng ryeynmong hosweynjn, wada mangal 262 hyo ka dmkuh hiya, wada ini baka ka mtunarac pay balay hantay tang na "Knmalu Balay Hungary Undo" snkaul na qridin Hosweynjn Krisztina Morvai, wada mangal 40 hyo, so kiya wada mndungus balay mbiyax mangal, kiya mi idas 5 diyax 10 ka psdhuwan phiyu soto mi prading 5 kngkawas na qpahun soto. Tasapah Qridin niya ka hwakwan Anita Herczegh. Ddha dha pa tnquli 3 laqi qridin mi 1 laqi snaw. Baki niya Géza Herczegh pa kndadax kngkawas 1993 dhuq kngkawas 2003 u mnniq Haiya na Kwoci Hoying taxa hwakwan. Pprngawan kari Hungary Kwohuy mniq kngkawas 2018 idas 12 diyax 19 wada muda knsangan dha 'Waya Quli' ka Rawkong Kayke Hwaan (Burah rawkonghwa pndungus kucu knbeyhing bay biyax, malu meysa mpqpah sediq u tnkawas nmalan qmpah diyax smpeyyah 250 jikang malan pkrana dhuq 400 jikang, mthiti snduwan pkrbangun dhuq 3 knkawas). Dmkuh congri Orban Viktor madas burah waya ka soto Áder János mniq diyax 20 cida ini qita kcka qnlhangan hantay balay, sndhu pbatas burah waya rawkong. Swey niya pa mdakar soto Áder János iya balay uda pbatas pnsdhuwan burah waya, konghuy uri u psicu qulung muda psdhu matas burah waya daw muda dmudul knkana hmtur qmpah Mtunarac cicin cngtang "Knmalu Balay Hungary Undo" smriq msang congri Orban Viktor ndan niya niyi ka snsiqa balay. Pnyahan pnatas

= János Áder = Mntocing hngkawas 1959 idas 5 jiyax 3 ka János Áder ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bokong klwaan Hongary ta sayang o kiya ka János Áder, pnaah hngkawas 2012 idas 5 jiyax 10 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. = Áder János = Áder János (Kari Hongary: Áder János, kngkawas 1959 idas 5 diyax 9-), Hongary ryoso, seyji jnwo. Kngkawas 1990 prading psdhowan phiyo Cingmin Mong Gikay giying, kngkawas 1998 dhoq kngkawas 2002 ngalan Hongary Kokomin Gikay cosi, kngkawas 2009 wada mangal Oco Gikay giying. Kngkawas 2012 idas 5 diyax 2 wada danan omao soto Hongary Hongary Kwohoy, kngkawas 2017 ka wada mangal soto Dongan. Kndosan Mntoting toiwil daya Hongary tiping alang mkbrnox Cornao. Kngkawas 1978 mtmay soto Bodapest Pyasan Tobeyhing Roland Hwasweyying smlohay horico. Kngkawas 1986 dhoq kngkawas 1990, hiya o Hongary Ksweyweyn Syakayswey Keyngkyo Pomn na weynso. Hiya ka Cingmin Mong pnrdingan pnhiyo na ori, hiya ka Tang dha hwaswey cwancya. Kngkawas 1990 dhoq kngkawas 2009 cida o kwohoy giying ka hiya. Kngkawas 1998 idas 6 dhoq kngkawas 2002 idas 5 hiya o ngalan kwohoy cosi. Kngkawas 2009 cida o wada phyowan O Co gikay giying ka hiya. Kngkawas 2011 cida o wada tomal knpriyox Hongary pnwaya shwa na qpahon phiyo waya, so mosa kndokorico sing ka shwa Hongary. Hiya o tomal snborah smmalo waya seyngkyo na qpahon phiyo waya ori. Soto Kngkawas 2012 idas 4 diyax 16 cida, wada psdhowan soto hosweynjn cocng cida ka Cingmin Mong, kiya ka moda rmilih ronbong moro bntasan sediq mi mi wada malax qpahon ka brah soto Schmitt Pal. Kwohoy meytaq hyo cida hiya ka ngalan ccng ryeynmong hosweynjn, wada mangal 262 hyo ka dmkoh hiya, wada ini baka ka mtonarac pay balay hantay tang na "Knmalo Balay Hongary Undo" snkaol na qridin Hosweynjn Krisztina Morvai, wada mangal 40 hyo, so kiya wada mndongos balay mbiyax mangal, kiya mi idas 5 diyax 10 ka psdhowan phiyo soto mi prading 5 kngkawas na qpahon soto. Tasapah Qridin niya ka hwakwan Anita Herczegh. Ddha dha pa tnqoli 3 laqi qridin mi 1 laqi snaw. Baki niya Géza Herczegh pa kndadax kngkawas 1993 dhoq kngkawas 2003 o mnniq Haiya na Kwoci Hoying taxa hwakwan. Pprngawan kari Hongary Kwohoy mniq kngkawas 2018 idas 12 diyax 19 wada moda knsangan dha 'Waya Qoli' ka Rawkong Kayke Hwaan (Borah rawkonghwa pndongos koco knbeyhing bay biyax, malo meysa mpqpah sediq o tnkawas nmalan qmpah diyax smpeyyah 250 jikang malan pkrana dhoq 400 jikang, mthiti sndowan pkrbangon dhoq 3 knkawas). Dmkoh congri Orban Viktor madas borah waya ka soto Áder János mniq diyax 20 cida ini qita kcka qnlhangan hantay balay, sndho pbatas borah waya rawkong. Swey niya pa mdakar soto Áder János iya balay oda pbatas pnsdhowan borah waya, konghoy ori o psico qolong moda psdho matas borah waya daw moda dmodol knkana hmtor qmpah Mtonarac cicin cngtang "Knmalo Balay Hongary Undo" smriq msang congri Orban Viktor ndan niya niyi ka snsiqa balay. Pnyahan pnatas
